Surveillance Tutorials
  • Home
  • Tutorials

Tutorials for the surveillance package

This is the tutorial project site of the hackathon promoting the surveillance R package conducted in connection with the ESCAIDE 2016 conference in Stockholm, Sweden. The hackathon was implicitly supported by the Swedish Research Council as part of the project Statistical Modelling, Monitoring and Predictive Analytics against Infectious Disease Outbreaks (grant number 2015-05182_VR).

  • Please select articles to get a list of tutorials.
  • Alternatively, play with a shiny app providing insights on the effect of surveillance algorithms parameters
